name: Vegas Fever Slots – Play Free Casino Slot Machines
name_original: Vegas Fever Slots – Play Free Casino Slot Machines
description:
Looking for a genuine casino experience?

Look no further!

Vegas Fever brings real casino slot machines right to your phone. Play the most popular slots brands from real Vegas, Macau and worldwide casinos.

Play Fire Wolf, Legends of the White Buffalo, Gold Dragon Red Dragon, Royal Reels, Fortune Builder and more - straight from the casino floor!

Play Slots Tournaments to compete against other players for HUGE CHIP PRIZES!

Try your luck at our exciting authentic video slots & spin the bonus wheel every day to get more FREE CHIPS.

---Real casino slots, real casino excitement, real casino fun---

***A Truly Authentic Casino Experience***
Vegas Fever is in collaboration with American Gaming Systems (AGS) and Cadillac Jack – leading casino slot machine manufacturers. Thanks to this collaboration, we can deliver truly authentic classic casino slots games, the same kinds enjoyed by guests in worldwide and Las Vegas casino hotels. Play the same video slots as you would in the most prestigious real life casinos – right from your iOS mobile device!

***Progressive Jackpots, BIG Prizes***
Spin the bonus wheel every four hours and go for the MEGA PROGRESSIVE SLOTS JACKPOTS. With so many opportunities to win free bonuses, you may never have to deposit!

***Our Players Love Vegas Fever***
Just like any real life luxurious casino, Vegas Fever puts its players first. Here is what some of our players had to say:

- “I tried virtually every social slots app there is, Vegas Fever delivers the most authentic experience – love it!”

-Amazing slots, amazing experience – there’s just something about Vegas Fever”

----Authentic Vegas Slots, Genuine Vegas Excitement, True Vegas Thrills – Only at Vegas Fever---

LEGAL
Vegas Fever does not manipulate or otherwise interfere with contest outcomes in any way. Results are based entirely on luck and the choices made by players in the contest. Live contests are in no way endorsed, sponsored by, or associated with Apple. The games are intended for an adult audience. The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."
